lines.text: You may think that once dead people are dead that that is the end of them. Not so. They leave memories, which are very much like dead people living inside of you.
If there is one thing I have learned, it is accepting my limitations while accentuating my strengths. A new job awaits me somewhere, perhaps in your office. I hope that we could get along.
Look, Norah, no one ever said you were gonna be popular after you joined the firing squad, so get over it already. That's the price for a promotion. Didn't that fancy college teach you anything?

[voiceover]
It is true that to live inside a warm and nurturing environment is everybody's dream, but as we grow up we also need to experience independence and adventure.
